content.text:
# Century Motor Vehicle Company

Century Motor Vehicle Company (1899â€“1903) was a manufacturer of electric and steam automobiles in Syracuse, New York. The company switched to gasoline-fuelled internal combustion engine-powered  automobiles in January 1903, and went out of business later that year.
It is not to be confused with Century, a British motor company that produced cars until 1907.
